title: MAXIMUM VOLTAGE LIMITS
fullText:
The calculated PV maximum voltage of PV d.c. circuits shall not be greater than 1 000 V d.c. for domestic electrical installations.
The calculated PV maximum voltage of PV d.c. circuits shall not be greater than 1 500 V d.c. for other electrical installations.
NOTE See Clause 4.2.1.3 for PV d.c. circuit maximum voltage calculation.
